name: Event Horizon (itch) (ETM_Games)
description:
This is my completed 2D Shooter Project! I made the following modifications:

1) Added black holes that will consume the player! Removing 1 life.

2) Added a custom main menu song that I wrote myself in musescore!

3) Added different sized asteroids that can be destroyed by the player, or cause damage to the player.

Credits: Created by Evan McDonnell
